b25.title: The DNA Inflammasome in Human Myeloid Cells Is Initiated by a STING-Cell Death Program Upstream of NLRP3
b25.reason: This report shows that DNA-activated STINGdependent cell death occurs in human myeloid cells through lysosomal cell death and upstream of activation of the NLRP3 inflammasome

b69.title: Induction of necroptotic cell death by viral activation of the RIG-I or STING pathway
b69.reason: This is the first demonstration of induction of necroptosis in a STING-dependent manner

b72.title: Host Restriction Factor SAMHD1 Limits Human T Cell Leukemia Virus Type 1 Infection of Monocytes via STING-Mediated Apoptosis
b72.reason: The authors of this study identify a virus-induced STING-dependent apoptosis pathway dependent on IRF3-BAX signalling and show that this pathway is involved in control of human T cell leukaemia virus type 1 infection

b75.title: Signalling strength determines proapoptotic functions of STING
b75.reason: This study identifies DNA-induced apoptosis in T cells that is mediated through STING-dependent transcription of pro-apoptotic genes

b122.title: The DNA-sensing AIM2 inflammasome controls radiation-induced cell death and tissue injury
b122.reason: This study shows that AIM2-mediated pyroptosis plays a central role in radiation-induced cell death and tissue damage

b124.title: ATG16L1 orchestrates interleukin-22 signaling in the intestinal epithelium via cGAS–STING
b124.reason: This work shows that lack of the autophagy protein ATG16L unmasks a STING-dependent necroptosis pathway
